faqs.question: What is this app about?
faqs.answer: This app helps you manage your finances with tools for budgeting, tracking expenses, managing investments, and planning financial goals.

faqs.question: How do I create a budget?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the Budget section, enter your income and expenses, and the app will help you track and manage your budget effectively.

faqs.question: Can I link my bank accounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can securely link multiple bank accounts to sync transactions automatically and easily track your finances.

faqs.question: How can I track my expenses?
faqs.answer: Use the Transactions section to manually enter expenses or auto-categorize linked bank transactions, with detailed reports available.

faqs.question: What investment tools are available?
faqs.answer: Track your investments, analyze performance, and receive insights and recommendations for stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and more.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, your data is protected with encryption, multi-factor authentication, and regular security audits to ensure privacy and security.
